Texts.SelectCountry: Please select your country to determine if our e-commerce experience is available for you at this time.
Texts.AccountAssociatedGeneral: To create an account associated with an existing Motorola Solutions number.
Texts.AccountAssociatedException: Otherwise, to create a new account with Motorola Solutions please complete the information below.
Texts.LegalNotice: Choosing "Register" means that you agree to the Motorola Solutions Services Agreement
Texts.SendmktSaleNotify: Send me information about new Motorola Solutions products and services, deals or recommendations.
Texts.SendOrdersNotify: Send me an email notification about my orders (Including shipment, cancel and update notifications).
Texts.DoNotSendmktSaleNotify: Do NOT send me marketing information by mail. Check this button to stop receiving all MSI marketing information by email (except transactional mailings, subscription mailings about programs in which you are enrolled)
Texts.DoNotSendOrdersNotify: Do NOT send me any order email notifications.
Texts.IWouldLikeToReceiveUpdatesProductNewsAnd: I would like to receive updates, product news and promotional materials for Motorola Solutions.
Texts.AccountNumberAssociation: I would like to be associated with an existing account number
Texts.PleaseActivateEmailAndConfirm48h: To activate your account, please confirm your email address by clicking the link in the message within 48 hours
Texts.ThankYouForVerifyingYourEmail: Thank you for verifying your email address. You now have general access to product information, and you can make purchases at the Accessory Store.
Texts.SorryThisContentIsNotAvailable: Sorry. This content isn't available at the moment
Texts.YourLoginIdWasCreated: Your login ID was successfully created!
Texts.YouHaveRequestedToBeAssociatedToChannelP: You have requested to be associated to an existing Channel Partner account.
Texts.YouMayLoginWithLimitedAccess:
You may login with limited access. We have notified your company’s Administrator to complete your account setup
and allow you to see appropriate pricing and content. If you have additional questions,
you may contact your regional support team.
Texts.PopoverPasswordRules:
Password is case sensitive.
Password must be at least 8 characters.
Password must not contain spaces or tabs.
Password must contain three out of below 4 characteristics:
- At least one upper case character [A-Z]
- At least one lower case character [a-z]
- At least one number [0-9]
- At least one of the following symbols: !@#$%^&*(){}:”|<>?
Texts.PopoverAccountNumber:
An account number is 10 digit that typically starts with a 1.
To find your account number, please contact your
Administrator or a Motorola Sales Representative.
Texts.ThanksForDoubleCheckingYourEmail:
Thanks for double-checking, your email is already activated in our system.
Click the button below to
Texts.WeCantFindYourEmail: We can't find your email in our system
Texts.YourRegistrationIsInCompletePleaseClickT: Your registration is incomplete. Please click the button below to input your information and continue activating your account.
Texts.SomethingWentWrongPleaseClickTheButton: Something went wrong. Please click the button below to
Texts.WhoopsItsBeenOver48HoursPleaseClickTheBu: Whoops! It's been over 48 hours. Please click the button below to
Texts.ThankYouForRegisteringNonUS: Thank you for your registration request.
Texts.RegistrationUnavailable: At this time registration is unavailable in this area, however, if you submit your email address below, we will contact you as soon as access becomes available. Thank you again for your business.
Texts.ThankYouForSavingEmailNonUS: Thank you for submitting your email address.
Texts.RegistrationAvailabilityNotification: We will contact you when access is available in your country.
Texts.MobilePhoneCarrierInfo: Additional fees may apply per your carrier. Please contact your carrier for more information.
Texts.NoteRecentOrders: Note: Recent orders may not be shown on this list

Validation.SaveChanges: Do you want to save changes?(Y/N)
Validation.CancelChanges: Do you really want to discard changes?(Y/N)
Validation.TheLengthMustBeBetweenMinAndMaxCharacter: The length must be between {{ minLength }} and {{ maxLength }} characters
Validation.ValueDoesNotMatchThePattern: Value does not match the pattern
Validation.PasswordMustMeetXCharacteristics: Password must meet {{ minRules }} out of 4 characteristics: one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one of these symbols: ~!@#$%^&*()-_+={}[]|:;"'<>,.?/
Validation.PhoneNumberMayContainSpacesAndSymbols: Phone number may contain spaces and listed symbols: -.()[]
Validation.YouMustAgreeToTermsAndConditions: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions
Validation.YourEmailAlreadyExistsInOurSystem: Your email/user ID already exists in our system. Please
Validation.YourAnswerMustConsistOf: Your answer must consist of letters, numbers and listed symbols: -.()[]/
